member.summary: Defines an Account
member.exception: Thrown when the initial account balance, is set to a value less than the minimum account balance allowed.
member.param: Account Balance of a savings account
Unique Number Identifying a savings account

member.name: M:BankAppConsole.Account.makeDeposit(System.String,System.Double)
member.summary: Account transaction. Deposits a specified amount into the account

member.name: M:BankAppConsole.Account.makeWithdrawal(System.String,System.Double)
member.summary: Account transaction. Withdraws a specified amount from the account and saves the changes in the database.

member.summary: Gets or Sets the account balance

member.summary: Gets or Sets the name of an account

member.summary: Gets or Sets the account number

member.name: T:BankAppConsole.BankPolicy
member.summary: Defines the Bank Policies for some operations on savings and current accounts.

member.name: F:BankAppConsole.BankPolicy.MinimumSavingsBalance
member.summary: Variable defining the minimum savings balance

member.name: F:BankAppConsole.BankPolicy.MinimumCurrentBalance
member.summary: Variable defining the minimum current balance

member.name: F:BankAppConsole.BankPolicy.minimumAge
member.summary: Defines the minimum age to open an account

member.name: P:BankAppConsole.BankPolicy.minimumsavingsBalance
member.summary: gets or sets the minimum amount that can be in a savings account at any given time

member.name: P:BankAppConsole.BankPolicy.minimumcurrentBalance
member.summary: gets or sets the minimum amount that can be in a current account at any given time

member.name: P:BankAppConsole.BankPolicy.MinimumAge
member.summary: gets or sets the minimum age required to open an account type

member.name: T:BankAppConsole.CurrentAccount
member.summary: Current account. Represents operations particular to only current accounts.

member.name: M:BankAppConsole.CurrentAccount.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Double)
member.summary: Defines a Current Account Requires: The account balance never exceeds its minimum limit
member.exception: Thrown when the initial account balance, is set to a value less than the minimum account balance allowed.
member.param: Account Balance of a current account
Unique Number Identifying a current account

member.name: M:BankAppConsole.CurrentAccount.makeDeposit(System.String,System.Double)
member.summary: Current Account transaction. Deposits a specified amount into the savings account and saves the changes in the database. Requires: The amount to be deposited should not be negative Requires: The account number is valid
member.exception: Thrown when a negative amount deposit is attempted or, when the input account number is not same as the account number registered for the account.

member.name: M:BankAppConsole.CurrentAccount.makeWithdrawal(System.String,System.Double)
member.summary: Current Account transaction. Withdraws a specified amount from the current account and saves the changes in the database. Requires: The amount to be withdrawn should not be negative Requires: The amount to be withdrawn should be less than or equal to the account balance Requires: The account balance should be more than the minimum balance allowed for the bank Requires: The account number is valid
member.exception: Thrown when the account balance is not sufficient for the transaction or, when the amount to withdraw is negative or, when the input account number is not same as the account number registered for the account.

requires.description: Cannot withdraw more than the available balance
Account balance is Insufficient for this transaction

member.name: M:BankAppConsole.CurrentAccount.overdraftWithdraw(System.String,System.Double)
member.summary: Account transaction for Current Account. Withdraws a specified amount from the account and saves the changes in the database. Amount to be withdrawn will be more than the account balance.(Overdraft). Requires: The amount to be withdrawn is more than the current account balance. Requires: The account number is valid. Requires: The account balance value is positive.
member.exception: Thrown when the amount to withdraw can be withdrawn without overdraft or, when the input account number is not same as the account number registered for the account.

requires.description: Cannot use overdraft. Withdraw the normal way

member.summary: Controls the banks database. Can add a new account to the database and retrieve information from the database.

member.name: M:BankAppConsole.BankDatabaseEngine.SaveAccount(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Double,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.DateTime,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Updates database by adding new account. Requires: The email address is of a valid format.
member.param: Start amount in the new account
member.exception: Thrown when users phone number or email are of the wrong format

requires.description: Not an email address, please check input
Please check that the phone number is correct

member.name: M:BankAppConsole.BankDatabaseEngine.GetAccountBalance(System.String)
member.summary: Finds the account balance corresponding to the account number and returns. Requires: The account exists in the database.
member.exception: Thrown when the account number does not exist in the database.

member.name: M:BankAppConsole.BankDatabaseEngine.GetAccountType(System.String)
member.summary: Finds the account type corresponding to the specified account number. Account Type is current or savings. Requires: The account exists in the database.
member.exception: Thrown when the account number does not exist in the database.

member.name: M:BankAppConsole.BankDatabaseEngine.GetAccountName(System.String)
member.summary: Finds the account name corresponding to the specified account number. Requires: The account exists in the database.
member.exception: Thrown when the account number does not exist in the database.

member.name: M:BankAppConsole.BankDatabaseEngine.CreditAccount(System.String,System.Double)
member.summary: Updates the account in the database, by crediting the account corresponding to the specific account number in the database with the amount specified. Requires: The account exists in the database.
member.exception: Thrown when the account number does not exist in the database.
member.param: account number corresponding to the account to be credited.

member.name: M:BankAppConsole.BankDatabaseEngine.DebitAccount(System.String,System.Double)
member.summary: Updates the account in the database, by debitting the account corresponding to the specific account number in the database with the amount specified. Requires: The account exists in the database.
member.exception: Thrown when the account number does not exist in the database.
member.param: account number corresponding to the account to be debitted.

member.name: M:BankAppConsole.BankDatabaseEngine.GetCustomerInfo(System.String)
member.summary: Gets information about the customer owning the account with the specified account number. Requires: The account exists in the database.
member.param: account number corresponding to the account of the customer.
member.exception: Thrown when the account number does not exist in the database.

member.name: M:BankAppConsole.BankDatabaseEngine.AccountExists(System.String)
member.summary: Uses the account number to check if a given account exists. An account exists when the account number is found in the database.
member.returns: "true" if account exists, false if not.

member.summary: Uses Regular Expressions to check if email address is of the correct format

member.summary: Uses Regular Expressions to check if email address is of the correct format

member.summary: Uses Regular Expressions to check if phone number is of the correct format

member.summary: Uses Regular Expressions to check if phone number is of the correct format

member.name: T:BankAppConsole.SavingsAccount
member.summary: Savings account. Represents operations particular to only savings accounts

member.name: M:BankAppConsole.SavingsAccount.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Double)
member.summary: Defines a Savings Account Requires: The account balance never exceeds its minimum limit
member.exception: Thrown when the initial account balance, is set to a value less than the minimum account balance allowed.
member.param: Account Balance of a savings account
Unique Number Identifying a savings account

member.name: M:BankAppConsole.SavingsAccount.makeDeposit(System.String,System.Double)
member.summary: Account transaction. Deposits a specified amount into the account and saves the changes in the database. Requires: The amount to be deposited should not be negative Requires: The account number is valid
member.exception: Thrown when a negative amount deposit is attempted or, when the input account number is not same as the account number registered for the account.

member.name: M:BankAppConsole.SavingsAccount.makeWithdrawal(System.String,System.Double)
member.summary: Account transaction. Withdraws a specified amount from the savings account and saves the changes in the database. Requires: The amount to be withdrawn should not be negative Requires: The amount to be withdrawn should be less than or equal to the account balance Requires: The account balance should be more than the minimum balance allowed for the bank Requires: The account number is valid
member.exception: Thrown when the account balance is not sufficient for the transaction or, when the amount to withdraw is negative or, when the input account number is not same as the account number registered for the account.

requires.description: Cannot withdraw more than the available balance
Account balance is Insufficient for this transaction

member.name: T:BankAppConsole.Teller
member.summary: Contains methods defining transactions a teller can perform on an existing account. Teller can also open new account for a customer.

member.name: M:BankAppConsole.Teller.CreateAccount
member.summary: Creates a new account for a customer and saves the account details to the database. Requires: The Banks Policy conditions for minimum age to be eligible to open current and savings accounts are set. Requires: The Banks Policy conditions for minimum amount to be eligible to open current and savings accounts are set.
member.exception: Thrown when user enters wrong account type or gender
Thrown when the customer is not eligible to open any account
Thrown when user input is of the wrong format

member.name: M:BankAppConsole.Teller.MakeDeposit(System.String,System.Double)
member.summary: Allows the Teller credit a certain account by entering the account number and the amount to be deposited. Requires: The account number is currently in the banks database. Requires: The amount to be deposited is not negative.
member.param: The account number identifying the account to be deposited to.
member.exception: Thrown when the account number does not exist in the database
Thrown when the Amount to be deposited is negative.

requires.description: Please check input. Account Number does not exist

member.name: M:BankAppConsole.Teller.MakeWithdrawal(System.String,System.Double)
member.summary: Allows the Teller debit a certain account by entering the account number and the amount to be withdrawn. Requires: The account number is currently in the banks database. Requires: The amount to be withdrawn is not negative. Requires: The amount to be withdrawn is not greater than the present account balance.
member.param: The account number identifying the account to withdraw from.
member.exception: Thrown when the account number does not exist in the database
Thrown when the Amount to be withdrawn is negative, Thrown when the debit amount is greater than the present account balance.

requires.description: Please check input. Account Number does not exist
Cannot withdraw more than what you have, try using the overdraft

member.name: M:BankAppConsole.Teller.MakeOverdraftWithdrawal(System.String,System.Double)
member.summary: Allows the Teller debit a certain account by entering the account number and the amount to be withdrawn. Requires: The account number is currently in the banks database. Requires: The amount to be withdrawn is not negative. Requires: The account is a current account. Requires: The amount to be withdrawn is greater than the present amount. Requires: The account balance value is positive.
member.param: The account number identifying the account to withdraw from.
member.exception: Thrown when the account number does not exist in the database
Thrown when the account is not a current account.
Thrown when the Amount to be withdrawn is negative, Thrown when the debit amount is less than the present account balance, Thrown when the account balance is less than zero.

requires.description: Please check input. Account Number does not exist
Transaction valid for current accounts only.
Can withdraw normally, no need for overdraft

member.name: M:BankAppConsole.Teller.ViewAccountInfo(System.String)
member.summary: Displays the Account name, Account type, Account number and account balance for a particular account. Requires: The account number exists in the banks database.
member.exception: Thrown when the account number does not exist in the banks database

requires.description: Please check input. Account Number does not exist

member.name: M:BankAppConsole.Teller.getBalance(System.Double)
member.summary: Computes the account balance in currency format. Current accounts can have negative balances due to overdraft. ($ ###,###) indicates the amount a customer owes a bank if (s)he withdrew using overdraft.

member.name: T:BankAppConsole.AccountNumberGenerator
member.summary: Contains a method used to generate account numbers for customers

member.name: M:BankAppConsole.AccountNumberGenerator.GenerateUniqueString(System.Int32)
member.summary: Uses the crypto random number generator to generate unique strings of a specified length
member.param: The length of the string to be generated
